description: Ashukharma is the Vudran goddess of canyons and cliffs. She is the jilted lover of Dinehdal, god of mountain peaks, and lover of Matravash, goddess of the Matra River; her tale draws prayers from scorned lovers and those dealing with rifts between themselves and their friends or families.
name: Ashukharma
symbol: A deep, jagged gorge in dry earth
